document_data.name: Al-Bakbuk
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Bakbuk''', or the '''Babbler''',  was a [[gibbering mouther]] living in the [[Pit of a Thousand Voices]] within [[Sarahin]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|31-32}}
document_data.Description: The Babbler was formed from the carcasses of [[holy slayer]]s and [[saluqi]] greyhounds, giving it a distinct voice that was a combination of both.
document_data.Activities: The Babbler fed on holy slayers who were lowered into the Pit of a Thousand Voices as punishment for their crimes against the [[Everlasting]].
